title: New: Temme Scott – The Edge
body:
Photo: Emil Chang

The Phoebe Bridgers record from last year quickly become one of my most played albums.

The honesty and elegance to the songwriting grows with repeated listens, and really instils a sense of personality in each track. In part, it’s what attracted me to this new track from LA’s **Temme Scott** – the storytelling ability translates beautifully on _The Edge_, lyrically one of the finest tracks I’ve heard for quite some time. The Edge is lifted from her recent EP, First. Check it out below.

_I want to hate you but sometimes it’s hard / I wish I could speak without dropping my guard_
